body_html: There should probably me made an official translation project on a service such a crowdin to properly manage this. Distributing un-official translations of the documentation would probably result in misinterpretation and old-docs floating around. :/ I like the idea of a translated documentation and I believe it would help many people getting started with tensorflow.
